casebody.data:
Richard PIERCE, an Individual, and the Brevard County Professional Firefighters, Local 2969, International Association of Firefighters, Inc., Appellants,
v.
BOARD OF COUNTY COMMISSIONERS OF BREVARD COUNTY, Appellee. Case No. 5D17-1834 District Court of Appeal of Florida, Fifth District. Decision filed June 26, 2018

DECISION WITHOUT PUBLISHED OPINION

AFFIRMED.
